content.full_text: Promissory Note of Lewis E. Reed and John Armstrong to Charles Houghton, 4 July 18351
paragraphs: Promissory Note of Lewis E. Reed and John Armstrong to Charles Houghton, 4 July 18351

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote the main text on page one. Each man signed his own name.
2This unpaid debt likely resulted in a lawsuit.
